-N4Scj3q57UL-ESPCZX_.description:
ElasticRun is a B2B eCommerce platform for rural India

Opening up newer possibilities for brands to make their products available to rural consumers.

ElasticRun extends the reach of the brand's direct distribution networks to deep rural markets. It enables access to a set of net new stores and customers for the brands, which were not accessible through the traditional distribution networks. ElasticRun network helps eCommerce companies reach the customers in far flung rural areas through its crowdsourced logistics network. The rich transaction data generated on ElasticRun platform enables financial institutions to bring in a large number of rural stores as their SME customers. The same set of data further helps the brands to sharpen their marketing offerings to the rural markets.

The deep reach is made possible through the ElasticRun technology platform that enables a “no capex” and “variable cost” crowdsourced logistics network. Through its rural Kirana network, ElasticRun platform would channel trade, finance and data of $600 Bn consumption in India.

ElasticRun was founded by Sandeep Deshmukh, Shitiz Bansal and Saurabh Nigam in 2016. It is backed by multiple marquee investors.
-N4Scj3q57UL-ESPCZX_.name: ElasticRun

-N4SgDdfiIjsVLyIupiX.description:
PhysicsWallah family has crossed over 6M+ students and is continuously raising its bar in the field of education, giving everything that students need with best-in-class faculty to support them in achieving their dreams. Observing the financial implications of many enrolling in expensive online courses, PhysicsWallah focuses on providing affordable education to help students ace various entrance exams.
About PhysicsWallah Founder Alakh Pandey
Born in 1991 in Prayagraj, Alakh Pandey always scored admirable marks in his school years. From being a regular physics teacher to becoming a world-renowned physics teacher YouTuber and motivational speaker, Alakh Pandey. As education all over the world quickly shifted to the online medium, students started following him and his easy tricks on the internet with asking more of it, as he used simple language to teach with the help of a lot of examples.

Why PhysicsWallah?
In the era where education has become business when it comes to coaching for engineering and medical aspirants, Mr. Alakh Pandey AKA PhysicsWallah aims to provide high-quality and affordable educational content free of cost or minimal cost. Alakh Pandey has been paving the way for millions of students through his YouTube Channel and PhysicsWallah App/Website on which the team provides lectures for, NEET, JEE Mains, and Advanced level preparation.At Physics Wallah, students can opt from various batches such as Lakshya, Prayas and Manzil. These are divided based on the level of the student aided by all-inclusive, batch-specific study material with a focus on concept development.

Vision of PhysicsWallah
Education, no matter where you are, has the power to change everything and grow you tremendously moreover that's what our founder, Alakh Pandey Sir, believes in
"education for all, regardless of their socioeconomic status" We provide premium education to all by offering a variety of learning options through our batches to meet all of our students.
-N4SgDdfiIjsVLyIupiX.name: Physicswallah

-N5QtM3M_M29NjYcz9q6.description:
At Saviant, we are on a mission to simplify the industrial world around us. 
We work with machine manufacturers & industrial engineering businesses, for their data platform engineering, advanced analytics and intelligent software implementations.

Since our founding 6 years ago, Saviant has successfully deployed over 300 industry implementations across USA, Germany, UK & Canada, working with 90% of our clients for over 4 years.

Our work in digital consulting & industrial automation has been recognized with multiple industry awards including the Deloitte Technology Fast 50 Award 2018, The Economic Times Human Capital Awards 2021 “Gold Winner,” the NASSCOM Digital Skills Award 2017, Great Place to Work™ for 2019, 2021-22 and Microsoft top-10 IoT Global Partners listing. 

More than 500 million smart machines are being deployed by industrial enterprises globally, creating an increasingly complex world – a world filled with connected devices, streaming data, distributed workforces & constant interactions. 

Our goal is to assist a thousand medium-sized businesses, across manufacturing & industrial engineering, to make sense of this complex world, and to deploy intelligent software solutions, harnessing the power of analytics, data & cloud technologies.

And help these businesses compete with larger competitors & provide higher value to their enterprise clients. 

We leverage leading cloud & data platforms, like Azure & AWS, to implement custom solutions for use cases across Industrial IoT, Machine Learning, Industrial AI and cloud-native apps.

Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella included Saviant’s industrial implementations in his keynote at Microsoft Convergence, 2015-16 (Atlanta, US), an event attended by more than 50,000 Partners & Customers. 

Today, Saviant is among a select group of Microsoft & AWS Partners recognized with a number of highest-level accreditations for Cloud Platform, Data Platform, Data Analytics, et al.
-N5QtM3M_M29NjYcz9q6.name: Saviant Consulting

-N5VdJfenCKje_26M0vf.description:
Bubble Nut Wash is a brand of natural detergent, The brand was conceived by an Indian student out of the need to provide a reliable source of livelihood to some of the rural and communities living in and around particular forest areas in India. BubbleNut Wash propagates the use of organic forest products and helps the local communities.
BubbleNut Wash has taken up the task to work to identify unique forest products that have market potential in the mainstream society and can hence benefit the community economically. To begin with, it has identified soapnuts as a commercially viable product. Soapnuts are a natural cleaning device that have been used for hair wash, dish wash and laundry wash for centuries. However, these nuts grow on some of the toughest terrains, either on the Himalayan slopes or deep inside the forests of peninsular India. BubbleNut Wash works mobilizes unprivileged rural women into producer groups who work to collect soapnuts all through Autumn and Spring seasons. They are trained to sort, grade, dry and pack and ship soapnuts for washing machine use. The market access provided by BubbleNut Wash enables women producer groups to generate additional income that can be spent on their children’s education and health.
-N5VdJfenCKje_26M0vf.name: BubbleNut Wash

The highly dispersible silica is used as filler in energy efficient green tires to improve the mileage of vehicles and reduce greenhouse gas emissions from vehicles.
Leveraging rich technical expertise of its team and its support systems & associations, Brisil has developed one of the most advanced technologies for the silica production using rice husk ash. The technology has already been successfully commercialized.

These robots will enable a thriving Cislunar economy, by developing infrastructure and utilizing resources on the Lunar surface.​ Our robotic platform will enable us to offer Product , Payload , Data and Mining services on the Lunar surface.

For humanity to have a long & sustainable future we need to start looking at Space as a natural extension to Earth, starting with the Moon. Resources on the Moon will be a stepping stone towards a sustainable presence in Space. Water-Ice, for example, will enable a thriving Cislunar economy by serving as a source of propellant.

To meet this oncoming requirement, we are building robots that can be utilized for scientific & prospecting missions in the short term (4-5 years) and industrial tasks in the medium to long term (6-10 years).

-N8lyh_l6vaaOxwDC8KP.description:
AirTap is India's first card-less credit-over-UPI payments system. We allow a user to scan a UPI QR code to pay from their assigned recurring credit line. We use alternate data and our social credibility algorithm for underwriting and collection. Our goal is to build a three-sided marketplace of micro-financial instruments for the lower-middle-class population of India on top of their purchase financing data.

To grow into a multi-trillion dollar economy, India needs a far greater penetration of credit that it currently has. This will need consumers and SMBs to be included in the credit demography, who are currently under-served with respect to credit. India has developed a unique position with its UPI infrastructure, but far lesser POS-devices penetration. And we believe that it's bound to leapfrog into a mobile-only payments nation, debit or credit, owing to its simplicity, zero-cost and the end-user experience.
-N8lyh_l6vaaOxwDC8KP.name: AirTap

-N9HEtDeLywTh5ufM6TD.description:
One800 is an organisation on a mission to re-imagine the after-sales service experience for electronic devices and home appliances.
Today’s Indian household has more devices than members in the family. And like it or not, they are an integral part of the household fabric and need their share of attention just like our family members. Whether it’s the 8 year old’s tablet or the loyal refrigerator or your own lifeline, the mobile phone. Damages, breakages, malfunctions are inevitable and more so when we keep adding devices to our household.

And what does One800 have to say about this?
Breaking good!

One800 is here now, so that you don’t break a sweat when your device is broken. With the help of technology and trustworthy partnerships, we aim to convert breaking bad to breaking good.
India’s 1st ever App, that brings together, service centres and consumers for seamless delivery of information and service. The after-sales industry is led by a thriving unorganised sector. The humble neighbourhood service centre could well be as good as any authorised service centre but we, have never had the right lens to look at. Until now!
One800 is that trusted lens that brings transparent & relevant information to consumers.

One800’s endeavour, of being the one stop shop for everything related to your devices, also lends itself to empowering & energizing thousands of service centres across India. With our one of its kind, video-based skill sharing platform called One800 Studio, every service centre now has an exclusive podium, to put across their skills and answer your queries in a rich video format. We are excited to see these experts create content that is informative, entertaining and who knows, even viral worthy!

This is a new chapter in electronics’ after-sales. A conscious effort, to offer you solutions, with a garnish of convenience and trust. We look forward to the time when One800 is the default choice for everything related to your electronic devices & appliance
-N9HEtDeLywTh5ufM6TD.name: ONE800

91Trucks, a division of Vansun Ventures Private Limited, is India’s youngest and fastest growing commercial vehicle website that aims to be a one-stop solution for all things related to commercial vehicles. Founded in 2022 by experienced leaders from IIT, ISB, with over 30+ years of experience in auto-tech, consulting and consumer tech in India, 91Trucks is building technology and products for digitizing the massively unorganized commercial vehicle space in India.
Today 91Trucks and 91Tractors are becoming a one stop destination for everything related to commercial vehicles including Trucks, Buses, Three-wheelers and Tractors. Consumers come to us for buying, selling, financing of commercial vehicles and for information, expert advice and community interaction!
91Trucks caters to audiences of all types, covering the entire commercial vehicle domain on a daily basis. Every single model that is on sale is covered to the minutest detail and daily updates make sure its users remain abreast with the changes in the industry. The website also provides transparent reviews, detailed videos and updated specifications of all vehicles so that users can make an informed decision.
Apart from generating meaningful content, we also work closely with automotive manufacturers and their dealer partners in more ways than one. In addition to connecting them with their prospective buyers directly, we also provide the latest IT solutions that help them in their business, including increasing conversion ratios.
Going forward, 91Trucks will divulge deeper into understanding the needs of a user when it comes to undergoing a commercial vehicle purchase virtually. From immersive 3D videos to covering the entire process paper-free, 91Trucks will become your preferred choice for both purchasing and selling a commercial vehicle.

-NJtd9MUdpHQU9dMypBL.description:
Pocket HRMS is a cloud-based HRMS that helps organizations manage and streamline their employee management processes. It is a comprehensive tool that automates various HR functions such as payroll processing, time and attendance, performance appraisal, training, recruitment, and more. It is an end-to-end HR payroll solution designed to address the various challenges and pain points of the HR team in managing the employees from companies of all sizes and verticals.
Headquartered in Mumbai, Pocket HRMS has a PAN-India presence with offices, vendors and channel partners in Chennai, Kolkata, Bengaluru, Delhi, Pune, Hyderabad and Gurugram. Some of the key features of this SaaS-based solution include an improved AI-based attendance system and an AI HR chatbot - smHRty, that can interact with employees to apply leaves, answer queries, and more.
Established almost two decades ago, Pocket HRMS’ core values are, ensuring the best in customer service, cost-effectiveness, and robust module offerings. Additionally, it also offers the HR team a unique global look at their database with smHRt searcHR, a unique implementation of its kind in the HR domain.
Pocket HRMS is a valuable tool for organizations looking to streamline their HR management processes and improve efficiency. It can help HR professionals save time and reduce the workload associated with managing employee records and other HR tasks, allowing them to focus on more strategic HR initiatives.
-NJtd9MUdpHQU9dMypBL.name: Pocket HRMS

-NKCmqP_Tk-DeginPhFg.description:
1. No proper 2 & 4 wheeler service/repairs at doorsteps

2. It's a challenge to find rapid vehicle breakdown assistance (2 & 4 wheelers)

3. Due to supply and availability of spare parts some car/bike services are delivering late.

Solution:
Tool Wings is an E-Service platform which offers vehicle repairs/services at customer doorsteps and we are the 1st to launch 50 minutes rapid vehicle breakdown assistance feature. 
We deploy smart moveable truck garages to serve customers at their preferred location (anywhere in India) at any time.
For customers who took subscription will get 50 minutes rapid vehicle breakdown assistance at any time & anywhere.

USP : We offer vehicle services at customer doorsteps and we are the 1st in India to start Rapid vehicle breakdown Assistance within 50 minutes of time. We establish a spare parts inventory for every 5 clusters (service zones) to deliver faster services and products as well. We not only selling spares to our customers we sell spares to garage owners and technicians also, so that they can deliver faster services for their customers also. Because some services will be delivered late due to availability of spare parts to sort out this we establish a single spare parts inventory for every 5 clusters, the spares which are needed to those 5 clusters (service zones) will be delivered from that inventory. We sell services to customers and we sell spare parts to both customers and technicians.

Now a days people need everything at their doorsteps with one click and vehicle services are burden to work at customer doorsteps. We plan a perfect model to make this happen and customer will be happy to use our services. And we offer 50 minutes rapid vehicle breakdown assistance for 2 & 4 wheelers as we see food delivery is some times getting delayed but we promise to provide service within 50 minutes of time, so this will create tremendous affect and everyone use our services for sure.
-NKCmqP_Tk-DeginPhFg.name: Tool Wings

-NLel7BMUihZULGaJ9Bm.description: IOT CONTROL OFFGRID SMART AND HYBRID BATTERY ENERGY STORAGE SYSTEM is a clean energy technology an alternating electricity generating systems. Clean energy technology is an important tool to renewable energy. The electricity generated by solar panels during daylight hours to help keep the lights on after the sun goes down. Looking into the future, clean energy enabling strategies and resources will be important to manage the dynamic nature of a high clean energy system. Notably, this involves accessing increased flexibility for the electricity system through generation resources, demand, and storage to manage variable supply from solar energy. The key technologies for energy storage system operation are developed to store it in a lithium ion battery storage system, and discharge it whenever your solar panel generation tapers off.
